ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Roleplaying server
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a Beastlord on Firona Vie he is a level 22 Iksar.  The language barrier is tuff for the 1st few lvs but you can emote in common. I head to pok and
ygData.messageBody:
I play a Beastlord on Firona Vie he is a level 22
Iksar. The language barrier is tuff for the 1st few
lvs but you can emote in common. I head to pok and
emoted the fact I wish I could speak Human or elvish
the 2 most common tongues and people will group then
spam you in no time your a master. Later in groups
people of other races are more than happy to exchange
lessons with ya during med time. Some will not let me
in a group because of your race, that is fine I dont
need the help of the softskins anyway. The roleplay is
fun tho. In general people are pretty nice and
dedicated there the trivial thing does bite.
My 2 copper Hogg
